PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02452022-03-04,  PWGSC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of RONALD CUTHBERTSON of Hamilton, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Suromitra Sanatani, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
